summary: Diff adds a global, user-facing initialization/query error banner in the AppLayout and introduces Vite env typings, but does not show any changes to build/deployment workflow configuration or the required static asset files under frontend/public.

missing_requirements.requirement: Investigate and fix the current build/deployment workflow so that a build actually starts when triggered and completes successfully for the current codebase (including clear failure output).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows frontend component/hook/type additions and an AppLayout change; there is no evidence of changes to deployment/build pipeline configuration (e.g., CI/CD, scripts, dfx config) or logging/error surfacing for build failures.
evidence: <file-diff>: only frontend files added/modified (frontend/src/components/*, frontend/src/hooks/*, frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts)

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure all statically referenced frontend assets required by the layout are present under frontend/public with matching paths (including /assets/generated/duel-smp-banner.dim_1600x400.png and /assets/generated/duel-smp-logo.dim_512x512.png).
missing_requirements.reason: AppLayout references the banner/logo paths, but the diff does not include any added/modified files under frontend/public/assets/generated, so there is no evidence the required images were added or verified to exist.
